subject: RE: [junit] Parsing Junit test results
messageBody:
<Jeff Nielsen's message quote>

/** Hack to get access to private fields in superclass */
private Object getField(String fieldName) {

</Jeff Nielsen's message quote>



This is awesome! :-)

After my first look at that class and a little bit of complaining in
this forum I've decided to re-write the class from the scratch (I'm now
half way there) to provide proper hierarchy, you just got yourself
access to private components :-)



"That's a nice trick" (C Matrix)



Dennis.
